name: Alec Bradley - Fine & Rare - Chunk
additionalNotes: Fine & Rare is an ever evolving project. It is a concept more than a cigar. Fine & Rare has been seen in many different formats since the project began. I play with different tobaccos and different crop years to create this 10 leaf masterpiece. I always need to let the blend dictate the size and shape of Fine & Rare in any given year. For 2021, Alec Bradley is proud to present 2500 boxes of the first iteration of Fine & Rare BC-(13)4EV. Celebrating the eleventh evolution of Fine & Rare, this collectors set contains 10 Churchill cigars and a very special 11th cigar to be revealed by enthusiasts upon box opening.
